entry.title: walterglezp/solid-react-ui: A lightweight, production-ready React component library built with TypeScript. Includes reusable UI elements like buttons, inputs, and tables. Designed for performance, simplicity, and easy integration. Fully documented with Storybook.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready React component library built with TypeScript. Includes reusable UI elements like buttons, inputs, and tables. Designed for performance, simplicity, and easy integration. Fully documented with Storybook.

entry.title: umanda/agile-tools: Agile Tools is a modern web application built using Next.js, designed to support and enhance Agile Project Management workflows. It provides a suite of practical, lightweight tools tailored for Agile teams to plan, track, and collaborate more effectively throughout the software development lifecycle.
entry.content: Agile Tools is a modern web application built using Next.js, designed to support and enhance Agile Project Management workflows. It provides a suite of practical, lightweight tools tailored for Agile teams to plan, track, and collaborate more effectively throughout the software development lifecycle.

entry.title: IsuruDH99/Grocery-store-Point-of-Sale: A lightweight web application built with React and Node.js for managing billing operations in a grocery store. It includes secure user registration with role-based access ,dynamic billing capabilities, and a clean, user-friendly interface. Ideal for small retail setups looking to streamline daily operations.
entry.content: A lightweight web application built with React and Node.js for managing billing operations in a grocery store. It includes secure user registration with role-based access ,dynamic billing capabilities, and a clean, user-friendly interface. Ideal for small retail setups looking to streamline daily operations.

entry.title: vaibhavjethva/leetlab: LeetLab is a lightweight, LeetCode-style online coding platform that allows users to write, compile, and run code in multiple programming languages directly from their browser. It uses the powerful Judge0 API as its online code execution engine.
entry.content: LeetLab is a lightweight, LeetCode-style online coding platform that allows users to write, compile, and run code in multiple programming languages directly from their browser. It uses the powerful Judge0 API as its online code execution engine.

entry.title: theCalculatar/restViz: restViz is a lightweight library designed to create a dynamic web interface for Express applications. It automatically lists all defined API routes, providing an interactive interface explore and document your API.
